headline: 3 Reasons AIG is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: AIG currently trades at $80.29 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a small loss of 3%. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 6.5% gain during that period.
